description:
The professional speaking industry yearns for diverse, compelling and honest stories - the kind of story that comes from ordinary people with extraordinary messages.

If you've ever thought that your story could change others' lives, if only you could get it out there - then this course is for you.

Whether you're wanting to educate others about better nutrition, raise awareness about environmental issues or simply extend your business practices to include public presentations this course will provide you with a complete framework for developing a speech that will impact your audience.

This course includes:

Over 90 minutes of video-lectures

Over 20 lectures

Additional worksheets to help you apply the tools as we go

Practical solutions from an awarded and recognised Inspirepreneur

Insights into the speaking sector

***BONUS*** full-paying students receive a complimentary 30 minute skype session discussing anything associated to you and your speaking ambitions
title: Inspirepreneur: Creating change through public speaking
